ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess you have never killed the Guano Collector in Sol B solo have you? Or been in an all melee group and had to check for invis casters?  Or wanted to help
ygData.messageBody:
I guess you have never killed the Guano Collector in Sol B solo have you?
Or been in an all melee group and had to check for invis casters? Or wanted
to help a night blind friend in a dark zone.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 10:40 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


next time you need to see invis with a pet caster around, ask them to cast
it on you. To my knowledge ALL pet casters get that spell.

Beyond that, when do you actually need to see invis? The only situations I
can come up with is when the group is moving someplace and everyone is
invisible. Pet isn't going to last long in that situation. OR, fighting
invis mobs, in which case, if you are wasting a song on see invis, get out
of my group.

Draelon Stormsong
Troubador of Karana
Tribunal Server


-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 1:33 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)



On Tue, Feb 27/01, "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...> wrote:
> *sigh* Did Kenross get sold on ebay? To say that the needed change to the
> lvl 19 song (adding see invis) made the lvl 24 song pointless is about the
> stupidest thing I have read on this or any list. Next time you need to
see
> invis with a pet caster around see how much they enjoy recasting their pet
> when you pulse clouding to see invis. Or maybe when you are fighting
invis
> mobs in PoA or another zone and have to use your flute so your party can
see
> the invis mob you are fighting.

Maybe he just leveled up to the point where he realized that while ideas
like the above look good in writing, in actual practice no one does
this. For any caster other than a hybrid, the mana to cast see invis at
L50 comes back faster than you can cast the spell.
